alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:28AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Randolph and southeastern Cleburne Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 528 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Heflin to near Corinth to Lineville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Heflin, Wedowee, Ranburne, Fruithurst, Edwardsville, Woodland, Morrison Cross Roads, Abernathy, Fosters Cross Roads, Corinth, Graham, Newell, Napoleon, Trickem, Lake Cleburne, I 20 Welcome Center, Micaville and Ofelia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
